These are your assigned 1000 Genomes Project sub-populations for our investigations of *ACE2* and *TMPRSS2* this semester! I've tried my best to accommodate personal interests in a particular sub-population, but there are always some that are more popular than others. If there's another sub-population you'd rather work on, please contact me directly to discuss switching.
